domains.Accounting and Finance: Skills related to financial management, regulatory compliance, risk assessment, and financial reporting.

domains.Administrative Management: Skills related to document management, administrative processes, and compliance oversight.

domains.Community Development: Skills related to community engagement, social program management, and cultural event coordination.

domains.Vehicle and Fleet Management: Skills related to vehicle maintenance, fleet coordination, and diagnostic analysis.
domains.Visual Arts: Skills related to painting, sculpture, digital illustration, and creative project management.
domains.Cultural Heritage and Documentation: Skills related to archival management, document preservation, and cultural information systems.
domains.Design Research and Innovation: Skills related to user experience research, product development, and innovation management.
